location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Sketch map of Khor Jarama and Khor Hajar

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink on paperDimensions:195 x 330 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Relief shown by contours.Hand drawn sketch map of Khor Jarama and Khor Hajar enclosed with a copy of a report by Captain W.L. Welsh on reconnaissance of the Sur area dated 14th February 1932 (folios 121-128A).Shows the proposed defence of the anchorage at Khor Jarama with position of landing ground at Ras al Hadd marked and measurements given. Landmarks numbered for reference and described in detail in the report.
